snippet: A fresh and very fair Saturday from Brendan Emmett Quigley and Caleb Madison
abstract: A fresh and very fair Saturday from Brendan Emmett Quigley and Caleb Madison
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY'S PUZZLE - We start today on a sad note: Gary Steinmehl, a constructor who had nine crosswords in The New York Times, has died after a courageous seven-year battle with cancer. Mr. Steinmehl's crosswords graced the crossword page on every day of the week except Sunday, and he will be missed.
